drag-and-drop-v2.question_text: Let’s assign the correct category combinations to the data elements within the Malaria data set. Look at the data set below and use the drag and drop to assign the correct category combination to each data element within it.
drag-and-drop-v2.display_name: Part 2 - Assign category combinations to the data elements

drag-and-drop-v2.question_text: Let’s build the data element groups and group sets. Drag and drop the data elements to assign them to their respective data element groups and group sets.
drag-and-drop-v2.display_name: Part 3 - Assign data elements to the correct data element groups
